product_name: Yonex GR Alpha Badminton Racket, Yellow, G4
description: The Yonex GR Alpha is a badminton racket with a stiff flex and an even balance which makes it great for all-courters. The racket is suitable for those who are new to the game and has a steel construction providing added durability. It features a standard (oval) head shape for touch, control and feel and comes with a head cover.

latest_reviews.author: Zainab N.
latest_reviews.text: Fantastic and great service. Shipping was faster than expected.

latest_reviews.author: Rajesh P.
latest_reviews.text: Customer service was outstanding when I had questions about the product.
